title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrats attempt massive power grab with Orwellian "For the People" Act. Who lies more: journalists or politicians? Left-leaning Monmouth poll shows public overwhelmingly supports voter ID. Graham and Sinema on ending the filibuster. Democrats want to do away with the filibuster. When Democrats smell power, they go for it. Republicans never do. The Senate saucer analogy. Manchin and Sinema will come under enormous pressure from Democrats. Should Herschel Walker run for Senate in Georgia against Raphael Warnock? Walker teases run on social media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
